website_summaries.verdict: A small yet mighty impact driver that is a great beginning tool for a variety of DIYers and weekend warriors.
pros: Small profile with included carrying case makes it easy to store and carry around
Kit comes with everything needed to use
cons: Not professional grade for larger projects

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, backwards compatible.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Bosch 12v drill about 8 years ago which has been an essential home tool. I saw this item, and was astounded to see that the 12v configuration of the battery was unchanged and bought it. It works great. I am not a building professional. I use these devices for around the house projects. It drives 3.5 inch screws without problem into pressure treated lumber repeatedly, and the battery life is more than adequate. I now have 4 batteries for my 2 Bosch drill drivers and am ready for anything!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline n Thor

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. I've replaced a drill with this and for ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I've replaced a drill with this and for light duty nut driving and screw driving into and out of pinball playfields, it's saved my back and shoulders the pain of much heavier, higher voltage units and works just as fast. It also strips out far fewer holes in wood when driving in, compared to a drill. I use it almost exclusive on the low setting. I've also had it for a couple months and it's still got 50% charge on the first full charge I gave it, so battery life is fantastic. Belt clip is great too and its so light it doesn't weight the pants down. Can't say enough good things about this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Poston

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool That Does Most of What You'd Likely Need, but Not as Strong as Competitor's
customer_reviews.text: Very useful tool that does so much right, from installing or removing deck screws without snapping them to driving 3/8" lag bolts/screws into soft wood. It's compact size and weight make it a pleasure to use on a long day. However, know that its competitor (e.g., Milwaukee 2453-20 or 2454-20) has more torque, which can be very useful in certain circumstances. For instance, this Bosch will not drive 1/2" lags (yes, we did drill the prescribed 5/16" pilot hole) into soft wood. If you can live with the PS42's 975 inch-pounds of torque as opposed to the competitor's 1200 or 1400 inch-pounds, then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Bosch's Handy Compact 12V Impact Driver
customer_reviews.text: A great, lightweight little impact driver. I'm a woodworking hobbyist and a DIYer. It has more than enough power to deal with running screws into hardwoods and its compact enough to fit into tight spaces (cabinets, drawers, etc.). If you're dealing with something that needs to be lightly driven, the low setting is delicate enough to run it through without destroying the screw. The ergonomics could be improved upon, the atypical barrel battery grip could use more of a contour on the back where your thumb and index finger connect on the palm. Though, how it's currently designed is not a deal breaker. If you don't need the power of an 18V/20V system, I'd recommend this 12V.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Perkins

customer_reviews.title: I liked the fact that it was a brushless unit
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it was a brushless unit. I also like that you can change it from low torque to high torque with the push of a button. This driver is more compact than the last one I had, which was a PS 41, which has brushes in the motor. The torque seems better than the previous model mentioned, too. Batteries charge quickly, and I like the light staying on for a few moments even after you let off the trigger! This driver is just the right size to get into tight areas that I work on every day building various standby generators & power units! A lot of torque for a 12v impact.
customer_reviews.author: buckslake

customer_reviews.title: Who needs 18v? This things a beast.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I use it alot hanging doors in a commercial setting. It torques the screws just perfect without twisting the heads off like my big makita tends to do if im not careful. The brushless 12v drill has been my go to screw gun for a few years now and decided it was about time to give the impact a shot. Wishing I'd pulled that trigger years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Get a Bosch, they make a great product
customer_reviews.text: I had my old Bosch for over 20 years and it finally quit on me. I have always been impressed with the performance of Bosch tools.
customer_reviews.author: B. Paes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for wood screws removing, placing from 1 1/4 to 2.5 in no issue. Also used to drill holes and tighten clamps. Very comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.author: james a knauer

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill. I work in maintenance so I’m using this almost everyday. It’s great for tight spaces or working over your head. It doesn't have the torque or drive speed of a 20v drill but it will still drive 3 1/2 inch screws just fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: First thing I tossed was the case. Well... it's a good storage case for usb cables or something during trips. I didn't need a big impact drill so I got this one. It works great! Very powerful and is small. Doing deck repairs, this can drill in a robertson head stainless steel screw without stripping out the screw's head. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: T.A. Gideon

customer_reviews.title: Great size & battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Great power in a small package - important with limited access in today’s vehicles! Battery truly lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little guy
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little guy can torque in or out just about any screws I deal with daily as an electrician. Battery life is excellent. I upgraded from the brushed driver to this brushless and I noticed a little more power and longer battery but that may be due to using the new batteries. I have the light and radio as well and would recommend all of them

customer_reviews.title: Best quality in the 12V brushless segment

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I had the bosch ps-40 impact for about 7 years. It was awesome so when it finally started to die I ordered this immediately. It's smaller, lighter and has more power. Love the belt loop on the back as well!

Led light is soo bright and its powerful for 12V, i am an electrician so for mounting boxes and for finishing jobs its great. And Bosch tools blue professional line is reliable and also popular in the Europe.

customer_reviews.text: Literally the best tools I have ever used. Equal to the nice IR stuff. I love this driver - It is strong with excellent battery life. Very well designed, zero complaints after using for a few months.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, powerful with a long lasting battery charge. Fits in the tight spots with plenty of torque.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Pickles
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product. I use my impacts every day all day. I'm a sheet metal mechanic, your impact is your bestfriend.

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing. Battery lasts me nearly a month and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily as an HVAC service tech. It's amazing. Battery lasts me nearly a month and I use it at least on 4 jobs a day. Smallest 12 v brushless impact on the market. Absolutely love it.

customer_reviews.title: best compact, powerful tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool! Very compact and surprisingly powerful. I like it better than the Dewalts. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.text: I use this product to drive lag bolts and decking screws. It has done a great job.

customer_reviews.text: Quick ship, smooth transaction, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED, AAAA++++. Quality impact drill.

customer_reviews.title: Great driver. Handle could be better
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product in many ways like most things Bosch. My only gripe is that the handle is a bit too fat for my hand and it doesn't have enough rubber for me to get a tight grip on it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little monster... prrrrrr
customer_reviews.text: Best tool ever... i use it for electric work and its the perfect tool to do the job. Worth the investment...

customer_reviews.title: I have the brushed version and was looking forward to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the brushed version and was looking forward to the brushless version from all the rave reviews, but when I received mine the battery was impossible to remove from the handle of the drill. It clicked in tightly, so tightly that it was impossible to push the side tabs on the battery in far enough to release it from the drill. Maybe it was a fluke but quality control should have caught it before it went market
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you it finally arrived it is in perfect condition

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.

customer_reviews.title: better then the brushed motor as far as power consumption
customer_reviews.text: better then the brushed motor as far as power consumption. the only thing i guess youll have to get used to is how it doesn't jerk forward and stop witch makes it seems weak or not as powerful but i tested against my friends Milwaukee 12v and on the same bolt and nut the bosch beat it with removing and installing the nuts and bolts. i was debating if i should get the Milwaukee or Bosch again and am glad i bought the Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: Bosch 12-Volt Max EC Brushless Impact Driver Kit PS42-02
product_meta.description: The Bosch PS42-02 12-volt max EC Brushless impact Driver Kit features a very compact but powerful 1/4-inch hex Driver, two 12-volt max 2.0 Ah batteries and a charger. The PS42 Driver has a 5.5-Inch head-length and weighs just 1.6 lbs., but it is a powerhouse, with an optimized impact system. It also has the Bosch performance control system, which supplies two speed settings, one for high speed and high torque and one for low speed and low torque. This delivers no-load RPM ratings of 0-1,200 and 0-2,600 and no-load impact-per-minute ratings of 0-2,700 and 0-3,100. The drivers produces 975-inch-lbs. Of max torque, great for repetitive driving tasks and about 85 percent of the fastening tasks around the professional jobsite. The tool's EC Brushless motor and improved all-metal gearbox allows for unmatched efficiency, great runtime and longer life. This Driver has a 1/4-inch hex drive and a three-led light ring. Includes: (1) 12-volt max EC Brushless impact Driver; (2) 12-volt max 2.0 Ah Lithium-Ion batteries; (1) 12-volt max charger; (1) belt clip; (2) screwdriver bits; (1) carrying bag
feature_bullets: Compact: The PS42-02 Features an Ultra-Compact Head Length of 5.5 Inches and Weighs Only 1.6 Lbs.. the Driver Is Lightweight and Ideal for All-Day Use.
TORQUE: The Bosch PS42-02 12 Volt Driver provides 975 inches --pounds of max torque, making it ideal for repeat driving tasks and about 85 percent of fastening tasks.
SPEED: The driver offers fast driving no-load RPM ratings of 0-1,200 and 0-2,600 and an optimized impact system with no-load impact per minute ratings of 0-2,700 and 0-3,100.
EFFICIENT: With a 12V EC Brushless motor, the PS42-02 provides unmatched efficiency with greater runtime and a longer tool life.
CONVENIENT: The PS42-02 driver comes complete with three LED lights for improved illumination in dark work spaces and a belt clip for quick and easy storage.
